cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTTO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY.It is requested that special care may be taken toensure the secrecy of this document.MOST SECRET.COPY HO. /* W.M.. .,(40 ) .40th CONCLUSIONS , MINUTE 6.Cong icle at ,i al ^ Annex.(13th February, 1940.)ASSISTANCE to finland.(previous reference:Wo Mo (40) 39thConclusions,Minute 6.)THE SECRETARY OF STATE FOR WAR informed theWar Cabinet that knowledge regarding the ski-ingunit d.estine& for Finland was now becoming publicproperty8 The Chief of the Imperial GeneralStaff had therefore suggested that this Unitshould be sent to France to train with the ChasseursAlpins, who would also be going to Finland; sothat the two detachments would eventually gotogether to Finland direct from France.The War Cabinet approved the aboveproposaloRichmond Terrace, S.W9lo
